Description:
Your own rural haven...
If you love a country atmosphere with the benefits of city living, here's the perfect hideaway. Only a 5 minute drive to Geelong CBD &10 minutes to coastal areas, the location of this hidden gem screams convenience whilst offering all the relaxing benefits of a rural retreat.
On a large allotment of 4,007sqm in a secluded cul de sac, this property offers a peaceful outlook of neighbouring farmland, minutes to Bellarine Village, local schools & public transport. This low maintenance home will leave you free to enjoy your downtime. Go practice your golf swing in the park or walk the kids to Splashdown for a swim.
This 6 y.o home is architecturally designed to enjoy the benefits of a northerly aspect & eco-friendly living, providing a 6 star energy rating. The external Linea weatherboards save painting in years to come & act as a great insulator, keeping the home warm in winter & cool in summer. The windows are double glazed, the positioning of the home allows plenty of natural light & the stylish allergy friendly bamboo flooring is ideal for easy maintenance. 5kW solar panels, solar hot water system & a 25,000 l rainwater tank keep energy & water bills to a minimum.
Comprising a wide entrance, sun drenched dining/living room plus a 2nd family/lounge area. The well appointed kitchen has plenty of storage space, a walk in pantry, stone benchtops, 2 Pac finish, glass splashback, gas cooktop, 1 ½ electric ovens & a dishwasher. There are 4 bdms, 3 have BIRs, the master has a WIR/ensuite. The central family bathroom has a separate bath & shower & separate toilet. Ducted vacuum throughout.
Outdoors is an impressive undercover area, ideal for enjoying the view of surrounding paddocks & farm animals & taking in this peaceful atmosphere.
The large allotment is a blank canvas, with plenty of room for the addition of more gardens, fruit trees or a pool. The huge shed is every tradies dream, measuring 7.5m x 17.5m, providing ample storage for extra cars, boat, trailer or a workshop. There is also a r/c DG with internal access to the home.
Opportunities like this are few & far between. Inspect & secure as your own, then sit back & enjoy the serenity of this beautiful rural setting.
All information is provided by third parties. You are advised to make your own enquiries regarding the accuracy of information relating to properties. Eastwood Andrews will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance to information supplied.

Description:
Easy Living In Established Location
Private inspections available - ring now!
Comfortable, low maintenance and generous in size, this impeccably presented home is ready to go. Simply move in, relax and enjoy.
Everyday living and entertaining is effortless here with plenty of space to relax and a kitchen that includes plentiful storage, a central island breakfast bar, quality appliances, walk-in pantry and Caesarstone bench tops. A second separate living zone, with double doors, can be closed off from the rest of the home making it ideal as a media room or as a quiet space to retreat to. The master suite is a highlight, light filled and inviting it includes an en-suite and walk-in robe. Three additional bedrooms (all with built in robes) are clustered around a large bathroom with separate bath and shower. Further features included ducted heating; ample storage; practical tile flooring in high traffic areas; cosy carpets in all bedrooms; and a double garage with internal access.
Outdoor entertaining on the covered patio will be appreciated all year round as will the expansive leafy outlook and the easy care landscaped gardens and lawns.
Located in a quiet and community minded neighbourhood, this property is a short walk to schools and childcare. Shops, cafes and dining are close by too, as are beaches, parks and playgrounds. Ideal for families or downsizers alike, this home will appeal to anyone looking for easy living in an established and convenient location.
Note: Photo id with current address must be provided at all open for inspections due to Covid 19 restrictions.

Description:
Home sweet home
If you're looking for your first or last home, look no further than this charming entertainer!
Your oversized master is complete with WIR and ensuite, and is cleverly located at the front of the home away from the other bedrooms. A large central lounge provides a much-needed second living space now that we're all spending more time at home. The open-plan kitchen/dining/living extends beautifully onto the alfresco and deck in the north-facing backyard, perfect for family gatherings and entertaining - in good time!
Relax and sooth the body of a night time in the undercover spa, and stay comfortable all year 'round with gas ducted heating and split system A/C.
Straight across the road from parkland and a short drive to Gateway Plaza, this quiet position is truly excellent.
Book your private inspection now to avoid disappointment.

Description:
PERFECT IN PRESENTATION, DESIGN AND LOCATION
Privately tucked away in a haven of native gum trees, this inviting character-filled home on a spacious 4748m2 approx. allotment offers an exciting opportunity for one lucky buyer. Primed and ready for family life, this home possesses all the right ingredients including privacy, picturesque surrounds and the convenience of a central location so close to the coastal waters of Torquay and Jan Juc.
The home is truly immaculate and is complemented by the sandstone exterior and all weather alfresco cooking space, full length covered decking and large grounds that deliver on outdoor enjoyment.
Inside, the flexible floor plan comprises a light filled main open plan living area that is undoubtedly the heart of the home. Entertaining is a dream in the kitchen with an abundance of preparation and storage space, quality appliances and stone benchtops. Located at the front is the master bedroom complete with his and hers walk in robes and ensuite, while the remaining three bedrooms are all generously appointed with robes and are serviced by a central bathroom. Add to this a second living, separate laundry, internal access to double garage and a massive 18 metre by 9 metre tradesmans shed and 3 bay carport.
Additional features include ducted heating throughout, split system cooling, high ceilings, 5KW solar system, two above ground water tanks, chicken koop and a location close to schools, public transport, town centre and beaches.
Insights: 243 Messmate Road, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Ready for your dream home location?
This 379m2 block is positioned on a corner lot offering a very open aspect ideally suited to a double story home. Having no properties on 3 sides youre able to design a light filled home to take advantage of views towards to ocean. With all services available and titled- there is no need to wait. Surrounded by prestige homes and close to everything we love about Torquay living this opportunity to secure you piece of prime Torquay land is now.

Description:
SUPERB FAMILY HOME WITH OCEAN VIEWS!!
Located in a family friendly neighbourhood and within walking distance to schools, parks, shopping centre, medical facilities, sports ovals, skate park and a few minutes' drive to the many beaches along the Surf Coast. This superb home with ocean views is your opportunity to purchase a modern light filled residence built for lifestyle and low maintenance living.
The fantastic floor plan is sure to impress a range of buyers, comprising four spacious bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe and ensuite, family bathroom and third living / study are situated on the upper level while the hub of the home on the lower level includes an open plan kitchen / living and dining zone with an outlook and glass sliders opening to a private rear grassed yard, gardens and entertaining area, separate second living room and good sized laundry.
Features include, stone bench tops, 900mm cooktop, engineered floating floors, plantation shutters, ceiling fans, powder room, ducted gas heating, built in pantry, double lock up garage and security doors. Whether you are looking for a place to call home or an investment property call today to book your inspection and purchase this superb family home with confidence tomorrow!!

Description:
The Ultimate Family Entertainer
Big on space and functionality this family home offers space to entertain and to come together as a family and relax. Spread across two levels, one of the properties standout features is the 20m frontage with garaging for 4 cars and off street parking for a further 3.
With the ability to accommodate a home business while taking the demands of a large family in its stride, this home opens up a world of possibilities in a convenient location and highlighted by the fact that it has a park over the rear fence.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Three living areas, bar in one of them
- 4 oversized bedrooms
- Modern kitchen with walk in pantry
- Abundance of storage throughout
- 3m square set ceilings on the ground floor
- Ceiling fans to bedrooms
- Double crossovers with 2 garages
- Rear roller door to yard for boat/caravan storage
- 2.4m garage door heights
- Impressive outdoor alfresco
- Ducted Vacuum
- 5kW Solar Panels
- Gas ducted heating and refrigerated cooling
- Alarm system and intercom
- Maintenance free gardens
- Park over the back fence
- Easy level walk to the beach
What The VENDOR LOVES:
We love this location, being very wide and quiet street with NO rear neighbours.
We are walking distance to Dunes Shopping Village & short stroll to Whites Beach.

Description:
Winter Hill An Alluring Californian Bungalow Awaiting Its Next Chapter.
Occupying approx. 753m2, this Californian Bungalow presents an irresistible opportunity in the heart of Belmont! The north-facing backyard is wonderfully spacious, while the charming interiors invite you to move straight in or renovate to create your dream family home (STCA).
With the popular That Place Patisserie & Café a heartbeat from your front door, you wont have to venture far to treat yourself. The bustling hub of High Street is also within easy walking distance, where you can enjoy an abundance of cafes, boutiques and big-brand stores. Families will love that public transport and Belmont P.S. are footsteps away, while Belmont High School is within close reach. Both the Barwon River and Barwon Valley Park are close by for fun-filled outdoor adventures.
Soaring ceilings enrich the interiors, with leadlight windows and decorative plasterwork showcased throughout. The generous front lounge creates a calming ambience, while uniting with the dining room via glass double doors. Graced with an open fireplace and window seat, the dining room is simply delightful. Timber shelves and subway tiles add a contemporary touch to the original kitchen, which is equipped with appliances (oven, electric cooktop, microwave and stainless steel dishwasher). Northern light sweeps through the sunroom, which provides the perfect spot to set up a study nook.
All three bedrooms are complete with wardrobes, while the bathroom features an open shower and toilet. Other features include a laundry, outside toilet, ducted heating and split-system air conditioner. Outside, the generous bungalow offers the potential to be transformed into a games room, home office, or artists studio. The paved outdoor entertaining area soaks up the northern sunshine and flows onto the large backyard. Ample off-street parking includes a secure driveway and single lock-up garage.
Whether you plan to move straight in or to renovate (STCA), Winter Hill is an absolute gem.

Renovate, develop or start again.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Developers, tradies and creative renovators, this is where you'll bring your dreams to life! This prime 663m2 north facing rear yard block located in family-friendly Belmont, has all the elements for your creative plans to come to life, all that's needed are your brilliant ideas to make the most of them. Make the next addition to your investment portfolio, renovate or extend to create your dream family abode, or re-develop in this convenience-plus locale (STCA)!
It's obvious from first glance that this property needs more than a little TLC, in order to reach its true potential. Consisting of three bedroom master with ensuite, central bathroom for remaining two bedroom, rumpus room and an open plan living, kitchen and dining area.
Within easy reach of the rapidly developing commercial hub in Torquay Road, High Street Shopping, Waurn Ponds Shopping, Oberon High School, Deakin University, Aquatic Centre, Epworth Hospital, the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in an hour plus just a short hop to Barwon Heads and the Surf Coast. Major public and private investment in postcode 3216 secures your investmentenquire today!

A Beach House is Not Just For Christmas
A true lifestyle offering, with a suburban slant complemented by the convenience of Old Torquay's offerings.
Delivered by a highly respected developer we bring you Townhouse 4 in this exciting new townhouse development situated right in the heart of Old Torquay.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Leave the car in the garage and walk everywhere
- Joinery integrated fridge Built-in robes

- Blackbutt hardwood timber floors & quality carpets
- TV antenna and NBN ready

Livability and convenience combine with classy high-end finishes and each townhouse is masterfully designed to deliver an effortless elegance. Enjoy sensational livability year-round with cleverly connected indoor and outdoor living spaces that allow you to enjoy all seasons in absolute comfort.

Description:
IT'S TIME TO LIVE THE DREAM
Fast forward your plans to move to the coast and live your best life in Pelican Court Barwon Heads. Theres a splash of magic happening beyond the big number nine located at the peaceful, river end of town this gem channels a mix of mid-century vibes and contemporary flair. A custom build that is only four and a half years old and presents wow factors at every turn like the impressive pink front door - this is a must see to then fall in love with!
Original 60s breeze blocks welcome guests and guide you indoors to a spacious and central hub. A stand-out in the open-plan living area is the bottle green cabinetry in the kitchen. Full of surprises such as hidden drawers, bench seat, top-of-the-range appliances, walk-in pantry and marble top.
Designed for airflow and solar passive heating with north-facing, double-glazed windows and warmth retaining besser bricks - utility bills are kept to a minimum.
An oversized barn door divides the second lounge and keeps out the noise when big people get rowdy. Venture along the corridor to three double-size bedrooms with built-in robes, plush carpet and ceiling fans. The childrens wing is complete with a separate toilet, laundry and shared bathroom with a soaker tub and eye-catching orange wash basin. It is uber cool!
The king-size master suite is positioned at the opposite end of the house. Finished off with a study nook, hotel-style en suite, black trimmings, external access and walk-in robe.
Made for entertaining the theme continues outdoors. Choose from a sunny deck, undercover zone, shady spots, established lawn and seven-seater spa. This will be the place to be post-sporting activities!
The list of goodness continues with raised vegetable beds, chook pen, water tank, double lock-up garage, polished concrete floors, split systems, wood fire, heightened ceilings, fruit trees and secure yard.
Live in a buzzing coastal village close to pristine beaches, local school, childcare, boutique shops, cafes, public transport and only 20 minutes into Geelong. Call Lynley to guide you through this catch! Private Inspections Welcome
Insights: 9 Pelican Court, Barwon Heads VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Barwon Heads have recently been sold.

Description:
FAMILY-SIZE SLICE OF BELMONT
Grab a sizeable slice of sought-after Belmont with this 1012sq m (approx.) property ideally positioned within easy reach of shops and facilities in Belmont, Highton and Newtown.
The immaculately presented brick home is move-in ready for a family with four generous bedrooms and a large garden for the kids to kick a footy or run free.
The central kitchen/meals zone is designed for family living alongside a light and bright family room/lounge so its easy to keep track of the kids.
The kitchen boasts a family-size oven and cooktop, plus loads of bench and storage space.
Step outside to an elevated terrace to enjoy the sun and views as far as the eye can see.
Other highlights include a central family bathroom, split system heating and cooling, spacious separate laundry, double garage conveniently located at the rear of the property, ceiling fans and well-established gardens and lawns.
The home is close to supermarket and strip shopping in High St, Belmont, and Highton Village, with Shannon Ave, Newtown, just across the river.
The property is zoned to Belmont High and Roslyn Primary schools, while Clairvaux Catholic Primary School, Christian College, St Josephs College, Sacred Heart College and The Geelong College are all a short drive away, along with the Ring Road to Melbourne, the Geelong CBD and waterfront.
Nature lovers are close to Balyang Sanctuary, Barwon Valley Park, Buckley Falls, the Barwon River and Queens Park too.

Description:
Belmont gem overflowing with potential & charm.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Ray Rounds on 0417 335 576.
Set upon approx. 794m2, this property presents the perfect entry point into the prized Belmont market while also offering scope for further enhancement (STCA). So if you're looking for a makeover project in a family-friendly location, this is the one for you!
Superbly located, this home comes hand-in-hand with a carefree lifestyle. Families will never have to worry about beating the school traffic again with Roslyn P.S, Belmont High School and Barwon Valley School all a short stroll away. The Barwon River is also within easy walking distance, along with Highton Village and the Highton Reserve sporting grounds. To top it all off, the vibrant High Street shopping precinct is moments away.
Constructed from Mount Gambier sandstone, you'll fall in love with the home's potential and unique charm. High ceilings and polished floorboards add character to the interiors, along with sash windows and decorative cornice. The front lounge flows through to the dining room, while the kitchen/meals zone is equipped with a Bosch stainless steel oven and Belling induction cooktop. Complete with a study nook, the living area is awash in natural light. Opening onto both the sheltered deck and garden, you'll love that this living zone creates a breezy indoor-outdoor flow.
The main bedroom is graced with a large dressing room, complete with built-in robes and vanity. Bedroom two features built-in robes, while the main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry with ample storage complete the layout. Home to established trees and gardens, the spacious backyard is overflowing with potential why not extend the original home or create your dream outdoor entertaining area (STCA)?
- Gas wall heater and split-system air conditioner
- Ten solar panels
- Driveway and single lock-up garage provide parking

Description:
Families and investors, here's the one!
Set on a large block in a highly desirable pocket of old Highton, this flexible floorplan offers self-contained living downstairs, making it perfect for families who want to give the kids their own space, or investors looking to maximise their return.
Those working and learning from home will love having a separate study, finally putting an end to working at the dining table! The magnificent north-facing balcony provides scenic views of the barwon river making it a perfect breakout space and - in good time - entertainment space to have your family and friends over.
The large backyard is heaven for the greenthumb, or you may wish to install some new turf to provide a great playspace for the kids. With multiple basketball rings set up out the front of neighbouring homes, this is clearly a great community for families and the kids will make friends in no time. Loads of solar panels will help keep the cost of living down, and you're just moments away from everything like schools and supermarkets.
If youre looking at the floorplan and wondering where the stairs come out on the lower floor - theyve been blocked off to make the lower floor truly self contained but easily reopened!
A reminder that inspections are by private appointment only. Call now to book yours!

Description:
SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE
This fully renovated unit in a plumb spot really does have a broad and varied appeal. Suiting numerous types of buyers, it would be perfect for the first home buyer, investor, downsizer, or retiree. Having been immaculately restored with polished boards, new kitchen, and bathroom, it also has a great outdoor entertaining area and a rare large parcel of yard space. Also, as a bonus it has both the carport and extra parking space outside the front door. In a complex of only 4, it is the back unit which means both quiet and privacy. The main living adjoins the L shaped dining which in turn is adjacent to the lovely kitchen. This overlooks the outdoor living ensuring a seamless flow from indoor to out. A hallway provides access to the 2 bedrooms and ends with the updated bathroom. Affordably priced to move fast, you will also have to move fast to secure it.
